Master Gobie:
Ah! You have returned.
And i see this has been another eventful errand...
I too have been confused when dealing with some of these other races.
The races of the Outer World and the evil creatures have complicated relations...
Still, as an intelligence officer, it is my task to make sense of all this conflicting information.
As you wrote in you report, we do not know whether the races of the Outer World and the evil creatures communicate secretly or use each other to gain thier ends..
Certaintly, the relations between them are complicated and often bloody.
